name: Vector Air
about: Vector Air is a full-service flight school located at the Erie Municipal Airport (KEIK) in Erie, Colorado. We offer all types of flight training for individuals seeking a new hobby or career in aviation. Our experienced instructors, with over 100,000 hours and 100 years of flight time, ensure a fun, efficient, and safe training experience. We provide private pilot certification, instrument ratings, commercial certification, tailwheel endorsements, and mountain training. Our on-site, award-winning maintenance center ensures our aircraft are impeccably maintained, prioritizing your safety above all. Whether you're new to aviation or a seasoned pilot, our enthusiastic staff is here to guide you every step of the way. Vector Air makes your flight training a rewarding and enjoyable experience.
